=====
snkit
=====

a spatial networks toolkit


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/github-snkit-brightgreen.svg
   :target: https://github.com/tomalrussell/snkit/
   :alt: snkit on github

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/snkit.svg
    :target: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT
    :alt: License

.. image:: https://travis-ci.com/tomalrussell/snkit.png?branch=master

    :alt: Build Status

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/snkit.svg
    :target: https://pypi.org/project/snkit/
    :alt: PyPI version


/ˈsnɪkɪt/ – sounds like `[snicket] <https://en.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/snicket>`_
(noun, Northern English) A narrow passage between houses; an alleyway.
